contents:
Opinion by
Mr. Chief Justice Sterrett,
This appeal was heard and considered with No. 390, January term, 1898, Estate of Marmaduke C. Cope, deceased, in which an opinion, affirming the decree of the court below, has just been filed, ante, p. 1. Both cases involve substantially the same questions; and, for reasons given at length in the opinion referred to, the decree in this case is also affirmed and appeal dismissed at appellant’s costs.
